page.title: 03Wildlife Preservation Trust
page.content:
The Trust has a laboratory with all operating equipment and a biologist to do blood tests and check for parasites. It has two vets who come in twice a week and in emergencies. In the Zoo there are l788 individual animals from the hundred different species.
There are only l5 Mauritius pink pigeons, one of the rarest animals left in the wild. There are two breeding centres for them: Jersey and Mauritius. Gerald Durrell released six birds into a botanical garden in Mauritius in l984.
The most successfully bred species is the white eared pheasant. In 1967 the Trust had only two pairs, now there are l5O which have gone to Zoos all over the world.
